title: Deepika Padukone's first look as Princess Mastani from the song 'Deewani Mastani' | Deccan Chronicle
text: 17, 2015, 16.51 pm Mumbai: The first look of Deepika Padukone as princess Mastani from the song ‘Deewani Masatni’ was released today. This will be the second official look that has been released of the actress from Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s upcoming periodic drama ‘Bajirao Mastani’. Her previous look as Mastani, has the star dressed in traditional Maratha body armour. Apart from her royal look, Deepika will be seen battling it out in the frontline as a archer in the army. The grand song launch of ‘Deewani Mastani’ will take place in Delhi. It has been reported that there will also be a fashion show, with models walking the ramp in a number of ‘Bajirao’ inspired ensembles. The entire show will be held against the backdrop of Aaina Mahal where the song was originally shot.
